42.12c. [Remigius of Auxerre] Remigius in Matheum cap. CCCLI.
General | Matthew
Manuscripts:
1. Bern, Burgerbibliothek, A.91, f. 1vb; no 1. saec. xii3/4. French. (J)
2. Graz, Universitätsbibliothek 234, f. 243vb. saec. xiii; Germany. (J)
3. Lisbon, Biblioteca Nacionale Alcobaça 246, f. 204vb. saec. xiii. (J)
4. Melk, Stiftsbibliothek 458 (693, M. 25), f. 115rb. saec. xiv; Austria. (J)
5. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica, Reg. lat. 28, f. 135vb. saec. xii-xiii. (J)
